title: 820-3662 high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
message:
Hello, we got an 820-3662 with liquid damage that came in dead. Some line at the CPU power IC was burned we replaced and now it works again but with a slow mouse and high fanspin. Apple ASD gives 2 errors.

- Sensor Current IM0C DDR test 1
- Ts0P Palmrest

So far we have replaced a new trackpad with cable and tried without cam/wifi installed. We also replaced U5560 although it looked good, no shorts there and all resistor measure OK.

Any other options? Customer is leaving tomorrow and I would be so sad if I made the mac work but cannot charge him :P

title: 820-3662 high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
message:
Post value for SMC_1V35MRM_ISENSE.
Check all resistors and traces of U5560.

Check R5370/71 and their traces to J4800.

title: 820-3662 high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
message: Unfortunately I didnt have enough time, so this one can be closed :(

title: 820-3662 high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
message: Customer came back with this Mac so im back on it. Resistors have correct values and traces seem to be OK. I have only 0.6v on pin 5 of U5560, should be 3.3v correct? Thats also what i measure on SMC_1V35MRM_ISENSE. I do have 3.3v at J4800 so it is being created. No short on pin 5 of U5560 as well, i measure 0.468.

title: 820-3662 high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
message: I found Q8012 missing from the board, so will replace that and hope that fixes it, will report back

title: 820-3662 high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
message: After adding Q8012 working again, tnx
